question_content.description:
### Problem21
So far we have learned all the Java constructs, functions and ADT. We
have encountered four different kinds of variables based on their
declations, please list them (Note that the 4 answers begin with 'i', 'p', 's', 'l' respectfully, in this order):

1. _____(0)\___ variables
2. _____(1)\___ variables
3. _____(2)\___ variables
4. _____(3)\___ variables

Each of the answer consists of a single English word.
question_content.author: Jiang Long
